verses.verse: For, behold, in those days <S%H3117><s%>, and in that time <S%H6256><s%>, when I shall bring again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>,

I will also gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8765><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%>, and will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> into the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>, and will plead <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with them there for my people <S%H5971><s%> and for my heritage <S%H5159><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, whom they have scattered <S%H6340><s%> <S%H8765><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and parted <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my land <S%H776><s%>.

And they have cast <S%H3032><s%> <S%H8804><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> for my people <S%H5971><s%>; and have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a boy <S%H3206><s%> for an harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a girl <S%H3207><s%> for wine <S%H3196><s%>, that they might drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Yea, and what have ye to do with me, O TZor <S%H6865><s%>, and Zidon <S%H6721><s%>, and all the coasts <S%H1552><s%> of Palestine <S%H6429><s%>? will ye render <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8764><s%> me a recompence <S%H1576><s%>? and if ye recompense <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me, swiftly <S%H7031><s%> and speedily <S%H4120><s%> will I return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your recompence <S%H1576><s%> upon your own head <S%H7218><s%>;

Because ye have taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my silver <S%H3701><s%> and my gold <S%H2091><s%>, and have carried <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> into your temples <S%H1964><s%> my goodly <S%H2896><s%> pleasant things <S%H4261><s%>:

The children <S%H1121><s%> also of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> have ye sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the Grecians <S%H3125><s%> <S%H1121><s%>, that ye might remove them far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from their border <S%H1366><s%>.

Behold, I will raise <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8688><s%> them out of the place <S%H4725><s%> whither ye have sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and will return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> your recompence <S%H1576><s%> upon your own head <S%H7218><s%>:

And I will sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and they shall sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them to the Sabeans <S%H7615><s%>, to a people <S%H1471><s%> far off <S%H7350><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.

Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye this among the goyim <S%H1471><s%>; Prepare <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8761><s%> war <S%H4421><s%>, wake up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the mighty men <S%H1368><s%>, let all the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> draw near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; let them come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

Beat <S%H3807><s%> <S%H8798><s%> your plowshares <S%H855><s%> into swords <S%H2719><s%>, and your pruninghooks <S%H4211><s%> into spears <S%H7420><s%>: let the weak <S%H2523><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am strong <S%H1368><s%>.

Assemble <S%H5789><s%> <S%H8798><s%> yourselves, and come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, all ye heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and gather yourselves together <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8738><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>: thither cause thy mighty ones <S%H1368><s%> to come down <S%H5181><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Let the heathen <S%H1471><s%> be wakened <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Y'hoshafat <S%H3092><s%>: for there will I sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8800><s%> all the heathen <S%H1471><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

Put <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye in the sickle <S%H4038><s%>, for the harvest <S%H7105><s%> is ripe <S%H1310><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, get you down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for the press <S%H1660><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the fats <S%H3342><s%> overflow <S%H7783><s%> <S%H8689><s%>; for their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>.

Multitudes <S%H1995><s%>, multitudes <S%H1995><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision <S%H2742><s%>: for the day <S%H3117><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of decision <S%H2742><s%>.
The sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> shall be darkened <S%H6937><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the stars <S%H3556><s%> shall withdraw <S%H622><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their shining <S%H5051><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> also shall roar <S%H7580><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, and utter <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> from Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; and the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%> shall shake <S%H7493><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: but the YY <S%H3068><s%> will be the hope <S%H4268><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, and the strength <S%H4581><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

So shall ye know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> dwelling <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>: then shall Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> be holy <S%H6944><s%>, and there shall no strangers <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her any more.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, that the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall drop down <S%H5197><s%> <S%H8799><s%> new wine <S%H6071><s%>, and the hills <S%H1389><s%> shall flow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%>, and all the rivers <S%H650><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> shall flow <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with waters <S%H4325><s%>, and a fountain <S%H4599><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and shall water <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Shittim <S%H7851><s%>.

Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall be a desolation <S%H8077><s%>, and Edom <S%H123><s%> shall be a desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, for the violence <S%H2555><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, because they have shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8804><s%> innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>.
But Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, and Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> from generation <S%H1755><s%> to generation <S%H1755><s%>.

For I will cleanse <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> that I have not cleansed <S%H5352><s%> <S%H8765><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> dwelleth <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>.
